snippet: David E. Pasinski, a former priest, writes that Sister Helen Prejean’s testimony that Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted Boston Marathon bomber, should not be sentenced to death “reflects her faith in God and in the value of human...
lead_paragraph: David E. Pasinski, a former priest, writes that Sister Helen Prejean’s testimony that Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted Boston Marathon bomber, should not be sentenced to death “reflects her faith in God and in the value of human life.”
